definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]

sentences.english: In this paper, multi-function digital clock system design.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了多功能数字钟的系统设计。

sentences.english: The content of this design is a timing controller which with a digit clock.
sentences.chinese: 本设计为一个带数字钟的定时控制器。

sentences.english: It's very convenient to use a SCM to design a digital clock with software.
sentences.chinese: 用单片机来设计数字钟，软件实现各种功能比较方便。

sentences.english: Fruit's not only good to eat, but it can also power this Fruit digital Clock.
sentences.chinese: 水果，不仅很好吃，而且还能驱动这种数字钟。

sentences.english: A device used to develop a time base for calculations and control, e. g. , a digital clock.
sentences.chinese: 一种用于产生计算和控制用时基的装置，例如数字钟。

sentences.english: Digital clock in their daily lives the most common, the most extensive applications.
sentences.chinese: 数字钟在日常生活中最常见，利用也最广泛。

definition: pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
perpetual calendar/ten thousand year calendar/Islamic calendar introduced to Yuan China by Jamal al-Din 紮馬剌丁|扎马剌丁
